short_description: tangle chocolate is a bakery based in williamsburg, massachusetts, united states.
long_description: i'm suzanne forman, founder of tangle chocolate. community and economic stabilization the cahabón farmers receive support and training on best farming practices from nonprofit organizations and the guatemalan ministry of agriculture to get the highest-quality cacao, with the greatest yield, in the most eco-friendly way. currently, farms are being passed on to the next generation, which means that cacao farming here is now a viable way to make a living. women-supporting business models the adioesmac is a gender-equal cooperative where women are encouraged to take on leadership roles. some of these women have applied their expanding business knowledge to create and sell products made from beautiful, locally-made guatemalan fabric. melt the moment with bean-to-bar chocolate slivers and treats at our chocolate lounge. we start with cacao beans from a small association of farmers in the cahabón region of guatemala. you can count on us always to use ethically-sourced cacao and pay more than fair trade prices, because we want cacao farmers to thrive.
business_tags: premium chocolates | box chocolate | dark chocolates | fine chocolates | farming practice | forest restoration | virtual tasting | hot chocolates | gluten free | dairy product | vegan options | chocolate mousse | favorite recipes | cashew butter | tart cherries | fruit trees | barn raising | dried beans | wood boxes | agriculture | mindfulness | full body | shipping & policy | private parties | events & holiday | party favors
generated_description: tangle chocolate llc is a company based in northampton, massachusetts, specializing in premium, handmade bean-to-bar chocolate. the company sources its cacao beans from 23 ecologically-minded farmers in the cahabón region of guatemala, where the cacao is grown on land that has been restored and revitalized through intercropping with timber, madrecacao, and fruit trees. tangle chocolate is committed to ethical sourcing and pays above fair trade prices to support the farmers. the chocolate is known for its high quality, single-origin, and organic ingredients, and is available in a variety of flavors, including dark chocolate and vegan options. the company also offers curated gift boxes and operates a chocolate lounge.
